content:
FHIR Subscriptions Connectathon track will be having a pre-connectathon meeting on Tues, Jan 23rd at 11a Eastern. If you're joining the track, considering it, or even just interested -- call in!

@Niklas Svenz√©n , @Jeremy , @Elliot Silver , @Brad Genereaux , @Nick Hatt , @Benjamin Flessner , @Will Maethner , @John Moehrke , @Bill Harty , @Christiaan Knaap , @Jens Villadsen , @Chris Melo , @Doug Sluis , @David Kwan , @Martin Bellehumeur, @Eitan Behar , @Stefan Lang

Here's the deets:

When: Tuesday, January 23, 2018 11:00 AM-12:00 PM. (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada)
Where: Go To Meeting - Details Below

~~~~~~~~~
FHIR Subscriptions Track Orientation
Tue, Jan 23, 2018 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM CST

Please join my meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/638450397

You can also dial in using your phone.
United States: +1 (872) 240-3311

Access Code: 638-450-397

First GoToMeeting? Let's do a quick system check:https://link.gotomeeting.com/system-check
Isaac - I will miss the call, but would like to keep up - good if it can be recorded
